references: R. Whitney, Problem H-254, Fib. Quart., 13 (1975), p. 281.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=0..14 of triangle, flattened
formula: Take Pascal triangle (A007318) and replace each i by Fibonacci(i): a(n, k)=Fib(C(n, k)).
maple: A045995 := proc(n,k)    combinat[fibonacci](binomial(n,k)) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 03 2014
prog: (Haskell)a045995 n k = a045995_tabl !! n !! ka045995_row n = a045995_tabl !! na045995_tabl = map (map (a000045 . fromInteger)) a007318_tabl-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 29 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
